event: Abbasid Revolution - Abbasids replace Umayyads as caliphs
commit_message: Initial commit: Abbasid Caliphate begins Islamic Golden Age

event: Foundation of Baghdad as new capital of the Abbasid Caliphate
commit_message: Feature: Construction of Baghdad as center of learning

event: Establishment of the House of Wisdom (Bayt al-Hikma) in Baghdad
commit_message: Major feature: House of Wisdom founded for translation and research

event: Al-Khwarizmi writes foundational works on algebra and algorithms
Translation movement peaks - Greek works preserved and studied
commit_message: Release: Major phase of knowledge preservation and expansion

event: Ibn al-Haytham completes 'Book of Optics' with revolutionary insights
commit_message: Innovation: Optics revolutionized with experimental method

event: Birth of Avicenna (Ibn Sina), physician and philosopher
commit_message: Feature: Birth of influential scholar Avicenna

event: Averroes (Ibn Rushd) born, major Aristotelian commentator
commit_message: Feature: Birth of influential philosopher Averroes
Release: Peak period of Islamic scientific contributions

event: Mongol invasions begin threatening Islamic centers
commit_message: Security update: Mongol threat to Islamic learning centers

event: Mongols sack Baghdad, destroying the House of Wisdom
commit_message: Critical: Destruction of Baghdad and House of Wisdom

event: Fall of Granada - end of Islamic rule in Iberia
commit_message: End of life: End of Islamic Golden Age in Iberia
